name: Arizona Jane and the Endless Ruins
name_original: Arizona Jane and the Endless Ruins
description:
Arizona Jane and the Endless Ruins is an endless runner prototype for 42 USA's first ft_gamejam.

Developer: Shawn Hicks

Free Adventure Girl Sprite and Animation by pzUH http://www.gameart2d.com

Background and tile assets by robotality http://www.robotality.com

Jumping and Death Audio by nagisaf https://nagisaf.wordpress.com/
